name: glfmultiples

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
glfMultiples is a GLF-based variant caller for next-generation
sequencing data. It takes a set of GLF format genotype likelihood files
as input and generates a VCF-format set of variant calls as output.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.
